JobFullDesc: FACEBOOK REALITY LABS  Account General Manager - Mobile Operators - Spain FRL EMEA Carriers Sales | Madrid, Spain Facebook Reality Labs (FRL) is looking for a highly talented Account General Manager (AGM) focused on Facebook Reality Labs consumer hardware sales for the carriers channel in Spain. Reporting to the Head of EMEA Carriers Sales, this role will lead all the commercial account related sales activities for multiple strategic accounts across multiple product lines. This is a critical new role in our new Carriers Sales Team. This is not your traditional OEM to Mobile Operator sales leadership role. We are looking for leaders and contributors who will break from tradition and create a change in GTM for the next computing platform. This role will lead the Facebook Reality Labs hardware business for the mobile operators in Spain, forming key relationships across customer leadership and working teams, and being the point of contact for the commercial relationship for all Facebook hardware. These roles require a seasoned leader that can work on multiple axes: build the future GTM structure; lead x-functional teams; and be hands on.  Successful candidates at FRL lead with influence before title and communicate easily across functions and levels of the team. You will need to be at home in a fast-paced environment with democratized information and working across Facebook Product Marketing, Category, Business Development, Marketing, and Operations teams AND at the same time working with the customer’s cross functional teams.Create the new channel, business, and collaboration opportunities that bring consumers into the Mobile Carriers channels looking for our customer’s and FRL products.Direct and manage FRL business activities with key mobile operators, implementing effective strategies and programs to meet organizational goals.Create, develop and maintain executive account relationships across the customer organization that lead to optimal business relationships, leading to both working and senior level planning, alignment and execution.Regular customer / market / product / competitive analysis that leads to account objectives and strategies. Regularly communicate with executives and internal / external stakeholders to align resources and achieve mutual goals.Negotiate and present account programs / contracts, gaining internal alignment and approvals with cross functional partners (finance, legal, operations, etc).Build and grow relationships with FRL cross functional leaders (e.g. Channel Operations, Sales Enablement, Sales Analytics, Category, etc ) to drive account goals.Lead & execute joint business planning, QBRs and product launch and seasonal planning activities to meet sales objectives within agreed upon budgets and KPIs.Manage account scorecard, allocate budget, identify opportunities for optimization and growth.
